data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tilbury, Colin R., Tolley, Krystal A. (2015): Contributions to the herpetofauna of the Albertine Rift: Two new species of chameleon (Sauria: Chamaeleonidae) from an isolated montane forest, south eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. Zootaxa 3905 (3): 345-364, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.3.2
